title: PixCon: Pixel-Level Contrastive Learning Revisited
details: Z Pang, Y Nakashima, M Otani, H Nagahara - Electronics, 2025
abstract: Contrastive image representation learning has been essential for pre-training vision foundation models to deliver excellent transfer learning performance. It was originally developed based on instance discrimination, which focuses on instance-level …
